content.rendered:
Directed by Adamma Ebo. Ibra Ake. Donald Glover. Stephen Glover.

Written by Donald Glover. Donald Glover. Karen Joseph Adcock. Karen Joseph Adcock. Janine Nabers. Janine Nabers. Janine Nabers. Janine Nabers. Malia Obama. Malia Obama. Ibra Ake. Ibra Ake. Stephen Glover. Kara Brown. Jamal Olori.

Cast Chloe Bailey (Marissa). Nirine S. Brown (Ni’Jah). Karen Rodriguez (Erica). Heather Simms (Loretta Greene). Kiersey Clemons (Rashida). Damson Idris (Khalid). Leon (Harris). Paris Jackson (Hailey). Byron Bowers (George Clemons). London Rose (Young Dre). Rory Culkin. Cree Summer (Rashida’s Mom). Kate Lyn Sheil (Cricket). X Mayo. Stephen Glover (CachÃ©). Teresa L. Graves (Patricia). Atkins Estimond (Reggie). Norm Lewis (Rashida’s Dad). Victoria Blade (Salem). Rickey Thompson (Kenny). Luis R. Hernandez (Investigator). Danielia Maximillian (Grace). Ashley Dougherty (Alice Dudley). Kimberly Ann Parker (Patricia). Coletrane Williams (Talib).

Producers Ibra Ake. Kris Baucom. Kara Brown. Domin/Epique Fishback. Donald Glover. Stephen Glover. Layne Miyamoto. Janine Nabers. Jamal Olori. Steve Prinz. Michael Schaefer. Fam Udeorji. Alex Orr. Lauren Heath.

Production Amazon Studios. Gilga.

Creators Donald Glover. Janine Nabers.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 7

Status On Going (2023–)
